products.name: Smartphone
products.short_description: Stay connected and enjoy powerful performance with our Smartphone.
products.detailed_information: Our Smartphone is powered by the latest Android 12 operating system, offering a smooth and intuitive user experience. It features a 6.5-inch AMOLED display for vibrant visuals and a triple rear camera setup (48MP+12MP+5MP) for capturing stunning photos and videos. Stay connected, browse the web, and multitask effortlessly with our Smartphone.

products.name: Flip Phone
products.short_description: Experience simplicity and reliability with our Flip Phone.
products.detailed_information: Our Flip Phone offers a compact and easy-to-use design, perfect for those who prefer simplicity. It features a 2.8-inch screen size for clear viewing and 16GB of internal storage for storing your essential files. With a long-lasting 2000mAh battery, our Flip Phone ensures you stay connected throughout the day.

products.name: Chuwi Corebook X Core I5 10th Gen 14-Inch Laptop
products.short_description: Unbounded vision with the ultraslim bezel display
products.detailed_information: The three-sided ultraslim bezels display is simply breathtaking: incredibly immersive viewing experiences. The ultraslim bezels are just 5.8mm thin at the sides for a near-borderless experience.The 2K display with a 100% sRGB colour gamut enables crisp, vibrant details.And the 3:2 aspect ratio is perfect for reading or writing.

products.name: CHUWI FreeBook 360Â° Flip 2-In-1 Convertible Laptop 13.5''Touch Screen
products.short_description: Compact and Portable, Carry it with You Anywhere
products.detailed_information: The 13.5' FreeBook adopts a compact and full-screen design. It's lightweight, thin and portable, and can be easily put in your backpack or handbag. Carry it with you whether you're on a business trip or travelling, so you could work anywhere, and your inspiration and creativity can be recorded and saved at any time. Powerful business office performance allows you to get rid of the shackles of traditional laptops and help you improve office efficiency anytime anywhere.

products.name: Chuwi HeroBook Pro Intel Celeron N4020 14.1 Inch Full HD Laptop With Windows 10
products.short_description: Experience the power of an everyday classic
products.detailed_information: HeroBook Pro is equipped with a 14.1-inch IPS screen with a wider vision and a 1920*1080 ultra-high definition resolution brings vivid details. Besides, the night mode and color setting will help reduce the onset of eye strain.
